title: Text from T- SHirt Back
content: This is logo from t-shirt back. Can anyone help me to findout the fonts. I specially need the help with the textlogo that dont look like from english alphabet. First one is just the below the text doufat & another are below the text spera & esperanza. I need help for another texts also :)
author: artslons

comments.content:
‘doufat’ is Futura.  
‘надежда’ is somewhere between Verdana and Myriad.  
‘надявам се’ is probably Helvetica (not Neue).  
‘希望’ look like Hiragino Kaku Gothic to me.  
‘ελπίδα’ seems to be a hodge-podge of different typefaces, or a font without proper support for Greek.  
‘희망’ is Batang.  
F

’speranza’ looks a lot like [Amadeus](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107125558/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/classic/amadeus/) by Anthony Nash, but it may only be one version of this antique script. Someone else may have done a similar revival. I only say this because I’m not sure the font is identical to your sample, though it is quite close.

- Mike Yanega

Non-font/offtopic: This is the second time (after the recent FontBureau thing IIRC) that I’ve seen «espérer» in such a comp. Isn’t «espérer» a verb while most others (certainly «speranza» & «Hoffnung») are clearly nouns? Hello English-speakers, other languages have separate words for _to_ hope, and _the_ hope. Ah, language.  
Sorry, carry on.

Or set your keyboard language on your OS to what ever language they are, Russian?

just coping & pasting can solve my problem for now but what if i got same kind of work in future?? thats why i want to know it.....i really don’t know what language they are to set my keyboard as per that language :(

What OS do you use?

Ergonis offers a helpful tool for the occasional insertion of foreign/special characters, [PopChar](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107125558/http:/www.ergonis.com/products/index.html).

FWIW,  
‘надежда’ is Russian.  
‘希望’ is Chinese/Japanese.  
‘ελπίδα’ is Greek.  
‘희망’ is Korean.
I do use WindowsXP professional. can anyone also help how to set keyboard language??
